record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. CON. RES. 228
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. CON. RES. 228 -- (House of Representatives - October 22, 2007)

[Page: H11820]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Representative MICHAEL T. MCCAUL be removed as a cosponsor of H. Con. Res. 228. Mr. McCaul was listed as a cosponsor due to a clerical error.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
